channel.title: Blink on ahjadann's fireplace

item.title: Site redesign
item.description: Hey there this is Tobi. Apparently there has to be this one blog post since this is a nice but blog related theme. I won’t use this site for blogging, so please don’t expect any posts. This is only for me showing off stuff I do or make and to play around with stuff. Regardless, feel free to check this place out!
